description: The film traces Canada's evolution, and the contributions of people at home and from many lands including Yousuf Karsh, Lester B. Pearson and Dr. Wilder Penfield. It explores the country from coast to coast and to the farthest reaches of the Arctic, bringing to the screen lively impressions of this second largest country in the world.
